title: F-STRESS-520: Empty Tensor Panic Prevention Tests
root_cause: Missing defensive tests for 0-byte and truncated model files
five_whys: WHY could loading crash? → No graceful error for malformed files
WHY malformed files? → Users may have corrupted downloads or partial files
WHY no tests? → Stress testing was deferred to Round 6
WHY Round 6? → P0 inference fixes were prioritized
ROOT CAUSE: Missing Jidoka (built-in quality) tests for edge cases
toyota_way_principle: Jidoka - Detect defects at the source, not downstream

fix.description: Tests verify that 0-byte and truncated files return proper errors instead of panicking
